statements: SELECT * FROM indie_game_settings;
SELECT game_name, release_date, developer_name FROM indie_game_settings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT game_name, setting1 FROM indie_game_settings WHERE developer_name = 'Indie Studios';
SELECT * FROM indie_game_settings WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM indie_game_settings ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, game_name, setting1 FROM indie_game_settings WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, developer_name, release_date FROM indie_game_settings WHERE developer_name = 'Indie Studios' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM indie_game_settings WHERE setting1 = 'High' AND setting2 = 'Low';
SELECT id, setting1, setting2, setting3 FROM indie_game_settings WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT game_name, release_date, setting3 FROM indie_game_settings WHERE developer_name = 'Studio X' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings;
SELECT game_name, developer, release_date FROM GameSettings WHERE developer = 'Nintendo';
SELECT * FROM GameConfigurations WHERE configuration_name = 'Graphics';
SELECT id, game_name FROM GameSettings ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings JOIN GameConfigurations ON GameSettings.id = GameConfigurations.game_id WHERE GameSettings.game_name LIKE '%Mario%'
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT game_name, developer FROM GameSettings WHERE developer = 'Ubisoft';
SELECT * FROM GameSettings ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, game_name, developer FROM GameSettings WHERE developer = 'Bethesda' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT configuration_name, configuration_value FROM GameConfigurations WHERE game_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_title, genre FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, config_name, config_value FROM game_configs WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, genre FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT game_title, config_name, config_value FROM games JOIN game_configs ON games.id = game_configs.game_id WHERE games.genre = 'Adventure';
SELECT game_title, config_name, config_value FROM games JOIN game_configs ON games.id = game_configs.game_id WHERE config_name = 'Difficulty' AND config_value = 'Hard';
SELECT game_title, setting_name, setting_value FROM games JOIN game_settings ON games.id = game_settings.id;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings;
SELECT game_name, developer FROM GameSettings WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT char_name, char_class, health_points FROM Characters WHERE attack_damage > 50 ORDER BY health_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM Levels WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' ORDER BY required_experience ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_value FROM Items WHERE item_value > 100 ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE developer = 'Nintendo';
SELECT char_name, char_class, health_points FROM Characters WHERE health_points > 100 ORDER BY health_points DESC;
SELECT level_name, difficulty_level FROM Levels WHERE required_experience < 500 ORDER BY required_experience ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_value FROM Items WHERE item_value > 50.00 ORDER BY item_value DESC;
SELECT game_name, developer FROM GameSettings WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Game_settings;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM Game_settings WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM Game_settings WHERE setting_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Game_configurations ORDER BY config_name DESC;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM Game_settings WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Game_settings WHERE setting_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM Game_settings WHERE game_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Game_configurations ORDER BY config_name ASC;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM Game_configurations WHERE game_id = 3 ORDER BY config_name DESC;
SELECT profile_name, profile_description FROM Game_profiles WHERE game_id = 4 AND profile_id < 5;
